title: 2017 had to have one more causality before it went out, this time to a meme though
body:
https://i.imgur.com/RjlG7eu.jpg/img

Joji, aka Filthy Frank, announced two days ago (December 29th 2017) he is quitting making FF skits/videos and YouTube in general due to serious health issues involving neurological issues and destroying his vocal cords doing the skits, yet also simply not enjoying making them anymore
